snippet.title: Ultimate Chicken Horse: A-cobra-tic Update Trailer
snippet.description:
The A·cobra·tic Update is coming to Ultimate Chicken Horse on March 12th 2020! This new FREE content will be available worldwide and simultaneously on PC/Mac/Linux, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PS4. Read more about the update below! ↓↓↓

The A·cobra·tic Update introduces:
- 1 new character: Snake (on a skateboard!)
- 2 new levels: The Ballroom and Space
- 4 new blocks: flamethrower, one-way gate, cannon, and beehive
- PS4 + Nintendo Switch cross-platform play

There’s also a handful of improvements, minor additions to the game, and plenty of bug fixes.

As with previous content updates, you will be able to unlock Space, The Ballroom, Snake, and Snake’s outfits by collecting unlock boxes on levels with a ? sign; and the new blocks will be available as soon as you download the update.

Check out the full details here: https://www.cleverendeavourgames.com/aco-update

Want to be in the know?
- Sign up for our newsletter: https://www.cleverendeavourgames.com/signup
- Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/ClevEndeavGames
- Join the official Discord: http://www.discord.gg/uch
